Body:
"""Test getting a compound by ChemSpider ID."""
compound = cs.get_compound(2157)
assert isinstance(compound, Compound)
assert compound.record_id == 2157
with pytest.deprecated_call():
    assert compound.csid == 2157
compound = cs.get_compound('2157')
assert isinstance(compound, Compound)
assert compound.record_id == 2157
with pytest.deprecated_call():
    assert compound.csid == 2157
